newsitem.title: USA: NYSE says begins real-time quotes on CCNfn, CNBC.
newsitem.headline: NYSE says begins real-time quotes on CCNfn, CNBC.

text.p: The New York Stock Exchange said it started transmitting Thursday real-time stock quotes to cable television channel's CNNfn and CNBC for display during their financial news broadcasts.
The change in policy from the previous 15-minute delay primarily was based on the growing availability of more current quotes through the Internet and other media, an exchange spokesman said.
Additional television outlets have expressed an interest in the exchange's real-time quotes, the spokesman said, declining to identify the parties.

"There are a variety of sources of real-time stock data now available through the Internet and other services. We just began making this data available real-time and we started talking to the potential users of this service just recently," the spokesman said.
CNNfn is a division of Time Warner Inc and CNBC is part of NBC Television, a unit of General Electric.
